General.Name: China Lilang Limited
General.Description: China Lilang Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the manufacture and sale of branded menswear and related accessories in the People's Republic of China and Hong Kong. The company designs, sources, manufactures, and sells business and casual apparel for men under the LILANZ brand through a distribution network covering provinces, autonomous regions, and municipalities. It also sells its products through online. The company also provides management services. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Jinjiang, the People's Republic of China. China Lilang Limited is a subsidiary of Xiao Sheng International Limited.

8.Name: Mr. Wang  Jun Hong
8.Title: Pres of the Product Planning Department
